source.interface:
<implements name="Iterable" />
* A collection of chromosomes that facilitates generational evolution. 2.0 $Id: Population.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $
* Access the current population size. the current population size.
* Access the maximum population size. the maximum population size.
* Start the population for the next generation. the beginnings of the next generation.
* Add the given chromosome to the population. chromosome the chromosome to add. NumberIsTooLargeException if the population would exceed the population limit when adding * this chromosome
* Access the fittest chromosome in this population. the fittest chromosome.
